issues.title: Missing Required Instruction on Effects of Alcohol, Narcotics, Drugs, and Tobacco for Grades 7-8
issues.description: Education Code 51202 requires instruction on the effects of alcohol, narcotics, drugs, and tobacco upon the human body for all grade levels. While this requirement is included for grades 1-6, it is completely missing from the grades 7-8 curriculum requirements.

legal_citations.text: The adopted course of study shall provide instruction at the appropriate grade levels and subject areas in... the effects of alcohol, narcotics, drugs, and tobacco upon the human body

issues.required_language: f. The effects of alcohol, narcotics, drugs, and tobacco upon the human body

issues.title: Missing Career Technical Education Requirements for Grades 7-8
issues.description: Education Code 51220 requires that courses of study for grades 7-8 include career technical education. While career awareness exploration is mentioned for grades 1-6, there is no corresponding career technical education component specified for grades 7-8.

legal_citations.text: The adopted course of study for grades 7 to 12, inclusive, shall offer courses in... career technical education

issues.required_language: 11. Career technical education: designed and conducted for the purpose of preparing students for gainful employment in recognized occupations and career technical education or advanced study in career technical education

issues.title: Missing Applied Arts Requirements for Grades 7-8
issues.description: Education Code 51220 requires instruction in applied arts for grades 7-8. This subject area is not included in the current regulation's list of required courses for grades 7-8.

legal_citations.text: The adopted course of study for grades 7 to 12, inclusive, shall include... applied arts

issues.required_language: 12. Applied arts: including but not limited to courses in consumer and homemaking education, industrial arts, general business education, or general agriculture

issues.title: Incomplete Reference to Education Code 51202 Requirements for Grades 7-8
issues.description: While the regulation references Education Code 51202 for personal and public safety instruction in grades 7-8, it does not include all required topics from this section, specifically missing the protection and conservation of resources requirement in the enumerated list.

legal_citations.text: The adopted course of study shall provide instruction at the appropriate grade levels and subject areas in... the protection and conservation of resources, including the necessity for the protection of our environment

issues.required_language: c. The protection and conservation of resources, including the necessity for the protection of our environment
